patthana16.33:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.33:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā soḷasa, ārammaṇe dvādasa, adhipatiyā terasa …pe…
patthana16.33:2.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
